text: Hello. I am new here so i dont know where to start. I am trying to create calculated properties using a bit more complex logic than combining existing properties together and adding them or multiplying them. My first question would be is there a way to define new variable in the calculated properties?
I am trying to calculate multiple things from info i receive from a FB campaign and with that info I am trying to send out later custom emails to customers...
maybe you have a look here: <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/crm/properties#create-calculation-properties>
